title: Bug 23787: [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should use Labels instead of Text fields
description: Bug 23787: [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields. Integration build 09/17. The current design looks fine on Windows, but on motif platforms, such as Solaris, AIX and HPUX, the text fields have automatic borders, making them look like user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, the fields have different colored backgrounds, which stand out even worse.
OB: On motif platforms, the Project Properties Info page displays text fields instead of labels. These text fields have automatic borders, making them look like user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris, AIX, and HPUX, the text fields have different colored backgrounds, which make them stand out even more.
EB: The Project Properties Info page should display labels instead of text fields. This will prevent the text fields from appearing as user input targets. The labels will not have borders and will not have different colored backgrounds on Solaris, AIX, and HPUX.
